name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Three principles for an affordable zero-carbontransition : sufficiency, to question our usages and behaviors. Efficiency to benefit from state-of-the-art systems. Finally circularity to use as little natural resources as possible. #ClimateWeekNYC//t.co/F3RKj1F143

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Le scrutin europen a prouv qu'il faut rconcilier la France de la fin du monde et la France de la fin du mois. Le contrat de filire y contribue grce la dcarbonation, la matrise de la facture nergtique et au dveloppement de l'emploi industriel dans les territoires.

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Meet B Team Leader and @ENGIEgroup CEO @isabelle_kocher: a climate action crusader working to secure clean energy access for all of our planet's people.//t.co/cTurrXLJ8o//t.co/0n6eyN5PhD

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: I am optimistic because there are great leaders leading the way. @PaulPolman is one of them. He is one of the few people who gave me the courage to pursue @ENGIEgroup' s major strategic shift #GPDF18//t.co/rfzHHnSw6D

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: If people have the power to follow their money and demand that it is invested differently: only then will things turn around rapidly. #GPDF18//t.co/h7aBYo0cYs

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: The same individual who is more and more environmentally conscious as a customer, as an employee, this individual as a saving individual has absolutely no clue about where their money is invested. #GPDF18//t.co/kYutImPS5R

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Businesses need to move with the times in order to grow. The more people are engaged the more committed they are. We need to stay in touch with people. Go out to society and get their feelings towards your business. @isabelle_kocher @ENGIEgroup #GPDF18//t.co/Sxq3UzxjAU

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: We are all under strong pressure for short-term. Things are changing, but very slowly ~ @isabelle_kocher of @ENGIEgroup at #GPDF18//t.co/iC6iOBI6Al

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Everyone in the company has to feel responsible for the strategy and for staying in touch with their environment. It's not just one person at the top who should decide on the future of the company. #GPDF18//t.co/dvweGKMn4b

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: My obsession: create a system that stays in touch with what is happening around us. We were too slow in the energy industry to grasp the major changes in society. This needed to change. #GPDF18//t.co/mhiflRYseb

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Expectations of civil society are changing. If you do not see that, you are dead. Look at the green manifesto written by students in France. Their message is clear: they won't work for companies that don't put the environment at the core of their business. #GPDF18//t.co/w2hi0aiDtD

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: We receive beautiful letters from investors, asking that we invest in activities creating positive impact on the long term. But when you actually meet investors: what truly matters in their eyes is the cash flow of the last quarter #GPDF18//t.co/yZ3ElTNpkT

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: CEOs are not heroes. It's people on the ground who are heroic, facing this short term long term dilemma every day #GPDF18//t.co/WPTvoENfru

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Roger Martin shares his thoughts about managing for the long-term. // @RogerLMartin @GDruckerForum #GPDF18 #Vienna//t.co/xIq5WgTGN1

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Roger Martin shares his thoughts about managing for the long-term. // @RogerLMartin @GDruckerForum #GPDF18 #Vienna//t.co/xIq5WgTGN1

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Construire l'entreprise du XXIeme sicle, c'est s'interroger sur sa valeur, son impact social-environnemental et dfinir sa raison d'tre dans son corps business. Partenariat @IfopOpinion @GSOSConsulting avec @isabelle_kocher @RolandLescure Salle comble au #PavillonElysee//t.co/c9VUJnIBlT

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Est ce qu'engager son entreprise ds une voie qui fait du sens cre de la valeur ? La rponse est oui. Est ce que pour un mme rsultat, les investisseurs donnent une prime de valorisation ces entreprises par rapport aux autres ? La rponse est non.//t.co/IPLuGSWzhU

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Il reste un domaine o exigence de sens doit progresser. Individu en tant que collaborateur sait trs bien pour qui il travaille. Individu client est de plus en plus attentif. Individu pargnant n'a aucune ide d'o il investit.

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Point principal que je retiens de l'tude @IfopOpinion : la demande de sens. Particulirement vrai des tous jeunes. Ils sont extrmement exigeants et n'hsitent pas me demander ce que nous faisons chez @ENGIEgroup qui pourrait leur donner envie de se lever le matin !

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: On a lanc une consultation extrmement large, en interne et l'externe #Engie2030 Nous avons reu des milliers de contributions crites, trs structures, qui ont demand des dizaines de milliers d'heures de travail.

name: Isabelle Kocher
text: Les membres d'une organisation n'ont pas envie de recevoir une stratgie toute faite Ils veulent tre informs, mais surtout co dfinir la stratgie, les grands caps//t.co/IUBmjBXHLr

name: Isabelle Kocher
